title: Peddy
description: Peddy is a pet shop application offering a wide variety of pet products and services. It includes a user-friendly interface and advanced filtering options to help users find the perfect product for their pets.
features: Search and filter products by category

title: Mountain Treks
description: Mountain Treks is an adventure booking platform for nature enthusiasts. Users can explore trekking packages and book their next adventure online.

title: Gadget Heaven
description: Gadget Heaven is an e-commerce application focused on selling gadgets and electronic items. It includes detailed product pages, customer reviews, and a seamless checkout experience.
